book.synopsis: Warned that death awaits him if he claims his inheritance of a cursed ancestral manor, Sir Henry Baskerville calls on Sherlock Holmes for assistance.
book.title_long: The Hound of the Baskervilles (Adventures of Sherlock Holmes)
